ds.focus_transition: rack to hands then back to eyes

drafts.sora: medium shot, eye-level, 85mm, shallow DOF; one camera move: slow push-in; subject: two 20s friends; background: winter street evening; action: hot pack handoff in a single beat; palette: muted warm neutrals, soft beige, charcoal; timeline: 0.0s hold eye contact, 0.8s hands rise, 1.5s handoff contact, 2.2s settle (grip ~0.2s), 3.0s micro smile + exhale; positives only; no clones; no watermark;
